name: Chop-Chop!
description:
This short game was initially made for the GE Jam #3 which theme was "Duality". In the end, we decided to submit to the Finally Finish Something 2021 Jam in order to polish and improve the game.

It is heavily inspired by Kuri Kuri Mix, a game made in 2000 by FromSoftware where you control two characters with only one controller. The goal is to reach the end of the level for the two characters, before time runs out.

We hope you will have fun, any feedback is welcome.

Thank you for playing!
